verses.roman:
sānande sakala vaiṣṇava bale 'hari' 'hari'
uṭhila maṅgala-dhvani catur-dik bhari'

synonyms: sa-ānande—with great pleasure; sakala—all; vaiṣṇava—devotees; bale—chanted; hari hari—the holy name of the Lord; uṭhila—there arose; maṅgala-dhvani—an auspicious sound; catuḥ-dik—all directions; bhari'-filling.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu stood up, all the Vaiṣṇavas loudly chanted, "Hari! Hari!" in great jubilation. The auspicious sound filled the air in all directions.
